title: Blackguards Deluxe Edition MULTi13. - PROPHET
description:
Blackguards - Deluxe Edition (c) Daedalic Entertainment

release date: September 2769
protection: Steam
# of discs: 1
languages: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/CZ/PT-BR/TR/
JP/KR/CN-S

What happens when the only hope of a threatened
world lies not with heroes in shining armor, but in
the hands of a band of misfits and criminals?
Blackguards, a new turn-based strategy RPG
explores this very question. You will discover over
180 unique hex-based battlegrounds within a dark
and mature story of crime, drugs, and murder. Play
as a warrior, mage or hunter and customize your
character's skills as you see fit. The challenging
campaign delivers a story of doubt, treason and
loss. You decide the course of the story at key
turning points and determine its outcome

The Deluxe Edition includes:

* Blackguards (main game)
* Artbook with ~150 pages
* Soundtrack
* Digital World Map
* Developer Interview Videos
* 6 Exclusive Wallpapers

The Untold Legends DLC is also included!

1- Burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
Language can be changed in the Options menu
The game is updated to v1.8.23320
